content.text: Rose has found a former friend on Facebook; they were friends in elementary school. She has sent the following inbox message describing what she has done over these years. Read it carefully and pay attention to the highlighted words.
content.name: uBII

content.class: bg-slate-100 rounded p-3 my-2 max-w-3xl mx-auto

content.text: Mariah! It’s been quite some time since we last saw each other in elementary school! I can’t believe I’ve finally found you on Facebook! A lot of memories have come to my mind. I remember we used to wake up early to catch the school bus together. Since then, our lives have taken different paths, but it’s amazing to see where we both have become. You’ve grown into such an incredible person!
content.name: 3Ovd

content.text: Over the years, many changes have occurred in my life. I’ve begun pursuing my passion for art and I’ve even bent some of the traditional rules to create unique pieces. My artworks have been broadcast on local TV channels, and some of them have even been sold. Also. I bet you never imagined I’d become a travel blogger! It’s been an exciting journey so far.

content.text: By the way, have you ever dreamt of traveling the world? Let’s catch up soon and share our stories, I’d love you hear all about your adventures and what you’ve been up to since we last met. Looking forward to reconnecting with you!
